title: Olympiade
description: 1) In 2019, I joined a programming group, where I solved algorithmic problems of various levels, first on PascalABC, and then on C++. I also participated in several Olympiads on behalf of the public school that organized the circle. The last time I managed to reach the regional stage, however, I didn't have enough points to reach the last republican stage. I didn't attend the club anymore.

title: E-Commerce, Telegram bots, Freelance, Self-education
description: In the summer of my 24th year, I started learning Python development. I studied the basic syntax, PHP, Code (Package manager), Lamba, decorators, iterators, OP, list comprehension, generator expressions, Flask, Django (frameworks). Also, to run a small commercial business, I immersed myself in the study of Telegram bot development. I started writing bots in Telegram to order and for personal purposes. Mydrop-shipping bot in telegram is @Planoise_test_bot.

title: Joining to IUT de Marne-la-Vall√©
description: In 2024, I joined MMI. This program combines several disciplines: marketing, graphics, design and programming. In programming, we studied the layout database (HTML, CSS), the basic syntax of Javascript and PHP, and we also learned how to work with the MySQL database management system.

title: Self-education
description: Since February 2025, I have continued my self-study in various areas: Front-end, Back-end, DevOps. I've studied React, Next, Tailwind, Sass, Framer-motion, Three.js for the Front-end. To build the api, I learned OOP in PHP, Laravel framework, and Redis. To deploy the server, I studied containerization on Docker, for port forwarding, I discovered Nginx and for remote storage of media and audio files, and began to understand buckets on Amazon S3. Since the beginning of my self-education (end of February 2025) I've created 2 projects on Next.js
